reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 335/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO GIVE CONSENTS - TOWN OF SIOUX LOOKOUT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO GIVE CONSENTS — TOWN OF SIOUX LOOKOUT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 335/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO GIVE CONSENTS - TOWN OF SIOUX LOOKOUT
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister’s authority to give consents under sections 50 and 53 of the Act with respect to applications made in respect of land within the planning area of the former Sioux Lookout Planning Board whose file numbers are listed in the Schedule is delegated to the Town of Sioux Lookout. O. Reg. 335/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Minister’s authority to give consents under sections 50 and 53 of the Act with respect to applications made in respect of land within the planning area of the former Sioux Lookout Planning Board whose file numbers are listed in the Schedule is delegated to the Town of Sioux Lookout. O. Reg. 335/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is subject to the condition that the municipality shall comply with the rules of procedure contained in Schedule 4 to Ontario Regulation 136/95. O. Reg. 335/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is subject to the condition that the municipality shall comply with the rules of procedure contained in Schedule 4 to Ontario Regulation 136/95. O. Reg. 335/98, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in section 2 is not complied with. O. Reg. 335/98, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The delegation of authority set out in section 1 is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in section 2 is not complied with. O. Reg. 335/98, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 335/98, s. 4. SCHEDULE B12/97 B1/98 B2/98 B3/98 O. Reg. 335/98, Sched.
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 335/98, s. 4.
